# Function name: remotes::install_github
# Notes:
#.blue[`remotes::install_github()`]
.center[.blue[`remotes::install_github`]`(*author/package*)`]
+ Downloads and install a package from from www.github.com.
```{r eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("RaymondBalise/rUM")
```
+ Use this release to get the latest bug fixes.
+ It checks to see if there is any new content before it downloads.
+ You will need tools to build packages.
  + These tools ship with Mac.
  + On Windows you will need to install [Rtools](https://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/rtools40.html)
---
